name: dev.ucp.shopping.discount
title: Discount Extension Complete Request
description: Extends Checkout with discount code support, enabling agents to apply promotional, loyalty, referral, and other discount codes.

allocation.description: Breakdown of how a discount amount was allocated to a specific target.

amount.description: Amount allocated to this target in minor (cents) currency units.

applied_discount.description: A discount that was successfully applied.

code.description: The discount code. Omitted for automatic discounts.

amount.description: Total discount amount in minor (cents) currency units.

automatic.description: True if applied automatically by merchant rules (no code required).

method.description: Allocation method. 'each' = applied independently per item. 'across' = split proportionally by value.

priority.description: Stacking order for discount calculation. Lower numbers applied first (1 = first).

allocations.description: Breakdown of where this discount was allocated. Sum of allocation amounts equals total amount.

discounts_object.description: Discount codes input and applied discounts output.

codes.description: Discount codes to apply. Case-insensitive. Replaces previously submitted codes. Send empty array to clear.
